newsitem.title: RWANDA: Two Belgian priests kidnapped in Zaire - diplomats.
newsitem.headline: Two Belgian priests kidnapped in Zaire - diplomats.

text.p: Two Belgian priests were kidnapped on Monday in the east Zaire war zone, diplomatic sources in this Rwanda border town said on Tuesday.
They said the priests were seized at Katana, about 30 km (18 miles) north of the rebel-held city of Bukavu.
The diplomats said the area north of Bukavu, on the western shore of Lake Kivu, was a stronghold of former Rwandan army Hutu fighters and Interahamwe Hutu militiamen opposed to the Tutsi rebels.
There was no firm information on who had kidnapped the priests, their identity or on their present condition.
